data.title: Film Producer Dino De Laurentiis dies at age 91
data.meta_description: "Monkey die, everybody cry." Legendary Italian film producer, Dino De Laurentiis, explaining why he approved of the death of Hollywood's most beloved primate in the classic film King Kong. De Laurentiis passed away November 10, 2010, at the age of 91.
